summary: The Killers are an American rock band formed in Las Vegas in 2001 by Brandon Flowers and Dave Keuning. The band's name comes from a music video logo. They've released seven studio albums, all reaching the top in the UK. The band has sold over 28 million records worldwide and performed in over 50 countries. Despite member hiatuses, they continue to make music and perform at major venues.
title: The Killers
